publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1838.1 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Flying of Flags from the Scottish Parliament Building—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1838) in the name of Iain Smith, leave out from "should" to end and insert "therefore demands that the Saltire, Scotland’s national flag, should be flown from the Scottish Parliament building at all times." Supported by: Shona Robison*, Ms Sandra White*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*

S2M-1838.1 Flying of Flags from the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 11 October 2004) Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Alex Neil*, Bruce Crawford*, Alasdair Morgan*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-1838.1 Flying of Flags from the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 11 October 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
